MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH4 postcode area of Edinburgh, affecting customers on Hillpark Way and surrounding streets. Engineers have identified an underground cable fault on Hillpark Way and we still expect all power to be restored by 8pm. We understand that to be without power is frustrating and we apologise for this. We will update this message if this information changes. Thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7.07pm on Friday 6th November 2020.
